abstract: QR National, Australia’s largest transport and logistics business, will likely agree to about 3 billion Australian dollars ($2.8 billion) of loans from as many as 10 lenders next week ahead of a planned share listing, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people familiar with the matter.
snippet: QR National, Australia’s largest transport and logistics business, will likely agree to about 3 billion Australian dollars ($2.8 billion) of loans from as many as 10 lenders next week ahead of a planned share listing, Bloomberg News reported, citi...
lead_paragraph: QR National, Australia’s largest transport and logistics business, will likely agree to about 3 billion Australian dollars ($2.8 billion) of loans from as many as 10 lenders next week ahead of a planned share listing, Bloomberg News reported, citing two people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: QR National Set for $2.8 Billion in Loans Before Listing
